name: Ext_R5_ChargeItemDefinition_pr_priceComponent
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.priceComponent for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.priceComponent from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ChargeItemDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Components of total line item price
element.definition: The price for a ChargeItem may be calculated as a base price with surcharges/deductions that apply in certain conditions. A ChargeItemDefinition resource that defines the prices, factors and conditions that apply to a billing code is currently under development. The priceComponent element can be used to offer transparency to the recipient of the Invoice of how the prices have been calculated.
element.comment: `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.priceComponent` maps to R4B `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.priceComponent`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: base | surcharge | deduction | discount | tax | informational
element.definition: `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.priceComponent` maps to R4B `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.priceComponent`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
